message: Let's be fair and end this quickly. I propose a 60/40 split.
Your split was a bit too harsh on me. I'm offering a more balanced 55/45 split in the spirit of fairness.  Let's wrap this up.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere.  I'm losing money every round we drag this out.  Let's settle this now - I'm open to a slightly better deal for you than my last offer.
